# Go Koans Copilot Instructions

This is a Go tutorial project designed as Koans for learning Go programming through Test-Driven Development (TDD). The project is specifically tailored for developers who already know Python and want to learn Go.

## Project Structure
- Progressive exercises in the form of failing tests
- Each koan focuses on specific Go concepts
- TDD approach: Red → Green → Refactor
- Comparisons with Python where helpful

## Development Workflow
- Run tests with `go test ./...`
- Fix one failing test at a time
- Progress through koans sequentially
- Use VS Code Go extension features

## Key Go Concepts Covered
- Basic syntax and variables
- Functions and methods
- Structs and interfaces
- Pointers and memory management
- Goroutines and concurrency
- Channels and communication
- Error handling
- Package management
